parsed.fixed_xml: <ITEM>2. Bey Herrn Euler dem Buchbinder am Rheinsprung ist zu erfragen, wo folgende B\u221a\u00bacher iraisonablem Prei\u221a\u00fc zu haben seyen : <BIBL><TITLE>Janii & Tremellii Biblia cum Annotationibus</TITLE></BIBL>; <BIBL><TITLE>Acta Eruditorum Lipsiensia</TITLE> de An. <YEAR>1738</YEAR>. & <YEAR>1739</YEAR>.</BIBL> <BIBL><AUTHOR>Mohemii</AUTHOR> <TITLE>institutiones histor. Christ.</TITLE> maiores <VOLUME>1. Seculi</VOLUME>, samtl. in <FORMAT>4t\u221a\u2264</FORMAT>.</BIBL> <BIBL><TITLE>Titus Livius</TITLE> ex Editione <AUTHOR>Joannis Clerici</AUTHOR></BIBL>; <BIBL><AUTHOR>Ovidii</AUTHOR> <TITLE>Tristiam & Epistolae ex Ponto</TITLE> mit <AUTHOR>Sinceri</AUTHOR> Anmerckungen</BIBL>; <BIBL><AUTHOR>Herodianus</AUTHOR> Graece & Latine cum notis <AUTHOR>Bocceri</AUTHOR></BIBL>; <BIBL><AUTHOR>Elianus</AUTHOR> Graece & Latine cum notis <AUTHOR>Schefferi</AUTHOR></BIBL>; <BIBL><AUTHOR>Schrevelii</AUTHOR> <TITLE>Lexicon Graeco Latinum & Lat. Graec.</TITLE></BIBL>; <BIBL><AUTHOR>Nisselii</AUTHOR> <TITLE>Biblia Hebraea</TITLE></BIBL>; und <BIBL><AUTHOR>Buxtorfii</AUTHOR> <TITLE>Lexicon</TITLE>, samtl. in <FORMAT>8v\u221a\u2264</FORMAT>.</BIBL></ITEM>
parsed.explanation:
Fixed 3 issues in the XML:
1. Escaped the & characters as &  
2. Added a missing closing </BIBL> tag after "4t\u221a\u2264</FORMAT>."
3. Added a missing opening <BIBL> tag before "<AUTHOR>Elianus</AUTHOR>"
